title: Microplane® Herb and Salad Chopper
description: Known for its innovative designs, Microplane’s new Herb & Salad Chopper reenergizes and modernizes the traditional mezzaluna with a distinctively modern and smart design to make prepping salads and a full array of herbs, as well as other commonly used ingredients, faster, easier, and more convenient.

asset.author: Microplane Kitchen
asset.hookText: Known for its innovative designs, Microplane’s new Herb & Salad Chopper reenergizes and modernizes the traditional mezzaluna with a distinctively modern and smart design to make prepping salads and a full array of herbs, as well as other commonly used ingredients, faster, easier, and more convenient.

transcripts: The new Microplane herb & salad chopper re-energizes and modernizes the traditional mezzaluna with the distinctively modern and smart design to make prepping salads and a full array of herbs faster, easier, and more convenient. Simply rock the herb and salad chopper back and forth over fresh herbs or lettuce. The herb and salad chopper has dual surgical grade stainless steel blades. The chopper is ergonomically designed and features a soft grip handle. By simply pulling the tab, the blades retract for convenient and safe storage. Push the tab in to lock in place. It is recommended that the chopper is rinsed in hot water immediately after each use. The herb and salad chopper is top rack dishwasher safe. It is recommended to leave the blade out while washing
